title: ‘I’d Rather Be Out of the Spotlight:’ Why Sepp Kuss is Returning to His Roots as a Super-Domestique
content:
'GC Kuss' no more? Colorado climber content with return to helper's role: 'If there's an opportunity I will take it.'

Read the full article at ‘I’d Rather Be Out of the Spotlight:’ Why Sepp Kuss is Returning to His Roots as a Super-Domestique on Velo.
author: ahood
